articles.title: Breaking News: Frédéric Arnault Named CEO Of LVMH Watches - HODINKEE
articles.description: The news comes amidst a greater shakeup in the group that sees Zenith's Julien Tornare become the new CEO of TAG Heuer.
articles.content: Big news out of Switzerland today as LVMH Watches has a new leader and CEO: the now-former TAG Heuer CEO, Frédéric Arnault. The news comes as a surprise given the great strides Arnault has made in tu… [+334 chars]
